content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5) and small-electric-pole(position x=8.5, y=9.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5)
Consists of boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with unknown position and unknown entities connected to it

### Electricity distribution at unknown position
Consists of small-electric-pole entities at multiple positions connected to each other

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the entity in your inventory before attempting to place it
- Make sure you are close enough to the target position to place the entity
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity

### Errors when using entities
- Ensure entities are fueled before attempting to use them
- Ensure entities have the required resources before attempting to use them
- Ensure entities are connected to the required systems (e.g. fluid, electricity) before attempting to use them

### Errors when extracting resources
- Ensure you have the required resources in your inventory before attempting to extract
- Ensure you are close enough to the entity you want to extract from before attempting to extract

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it
- Ensure the entity is of the correct type before attempting to get it
